CustomField.formula: IF ( QA_Manager_Data_Entered__c && RecordType.DeveloperName = "Policy_Services",( QA_Post_Review_Points_Earned__c + QA_Post_Review_Points_From_Burn__c )/ ( QA_Post_Review_Points_Earned__c + QA_Post_Review_Points_From_Burn__c + QA_Post_Review_Points_Missed__c ),0)
CustomField.label: QA Post Review Percent With Burn
